item.title: About me
item.author: alessandro.bresciani2016@gmail.com (Alessandro Bresciani)
item.description: Welcome to my blog!!! Hello, I’m Alessandro, a seasoned Cyber Security Lead, Staff Software Engineer, and passionate musician based in Rome, Italy. With over a decade of experience in the tech industry, my journey began as a self-taught software engineer, where I cultivated a strong foundation in infrastructure and engineering. Driven by a relentless curiosity and a commitment to continuous improvement, I transitioned into roles as a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) and DevOps professional.
